prop.name: tickerSymbol
prop.desc: The exchange traded instrument associated with a Corporation object. The tickerSymbol is expressed as an exchange and an instrument name separated by a space character. For the exchange component of the tickerSymbol attribute, we reccommend using the controlled vocaulary of Market Identifier Codes (MIC) specified in ISO15022.

Organization.name: serviceArea
Organization.desc: The geographic area where the service is provided.

Organization.name: funder
Organization.desc: A person or organization that supports (sponsors) something through some kind of financial contribution.

Organization.name: areaServed
Organization.desc: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided.

Organization.name: memberOf
Organization.desc: An Organization (or ProgramMembership) to which this Person or Organization belongs.

Organization.name: events
Organization.desc: Upcoming or past events associated with this place or organization.

Organization.name: subOrganization
Organization.desc: A relationship between two organizations where the first includes the second, e.g., as a subsidiary. See also: the more specific 'department' property.

Organization.name: hasOfferCatalog
Organization.desc: Indicates an OfferCatalog listing for this Organization, Person, or Service.

Organization.name: globalLocationNumber
Organization.desc: The Global Location Number (GLN, sometimes also referred to as International Location Number or ILN) of the respective organization, person, or place. The GLN is a 13-digit number used to identify parties and physical locations.

Organization.name: reviews
Organization.desc: Review of the item.

Organization.name: members
Organization.desc: A member of this organization.

Organization.name: aggregateRating
Organization.desc: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.

Organization.name: duns
Organization.desc: The Dun & Bradstreet DUNS number for identifying an organization or business person.

Organization.name: taxID
Organization.desc: The Tax / Fiscal ID of the organization or person, e.g. the TIN in the US or the CIF/NIF in Spain.

Organization.name: award
Organization.desc: An award won by or for this item.

Organization.name: makesOffer
Organization.desc: A pointer to products or services offered by the organization or person.

Organization.name: contactPoints
Organization.desc: A contact point for a person or organization.

Organization.name: awards
Organization.desc: Awards won by or for this item.

Organization.name: seeks
Organization.desc: A pointer to products or services sought by the organization or person (demand).

Organization.name: member
Organization.desc: A member of an Organization or a ProgramMembership. Organizations can be members of organizations; ProgramMembership is typically for individuals.

Organization.name: founders
Organization.desc: A person who founded this organization.

Organization.name: alumni
Organization.desc: Alumni of an organization.

Organization.name: dissolutionDate
Organization.desc: The date that this organization was dissolved.

Organization.name: address
Organization.desc: Physical address of the item.

Organization.name: logo
Organization.desc: An associated logo.

Organization.name: employees
Organization.desc: People working for this organization.

Organization.name: telephone
Organization.desc: The telephone number.

Organization.name: email
Organization.desc: Email address.

Organization.name: department
Organization.desc: A relationship between an organization and a department of that organization, also described as an organization (allowing different urls, logos, opening hours). For example: a store with a pharmacy, or a bakery with a cafe.

Organization.name: contactPoint
Organization.desc: A contact point for a person or organization.

Organization.name: parentOrganization
Organization.desc: The larger organization that this organization is a subOrganization of, if any.

Organization.name: legalName
Organization.desc: The official name of the organization, e.g. the registered company name.

Organization.name: foundingDate
Organization.desc: The date that this organization was founded.

Organization.name: employee
Organization.desc: Someone working for this organization.

Organization.name: numberOfEmployees
Organization.desc: The number of employees in an organization e.g. business.

Organization.name: naics
Organization.desc: The North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) code for a particular organization or business person.

Organization.name: hasPOS
Organization.desc: Points-of-Sales operated by the organization or person.

Organization.name: review
Organization.desc: A review of the item.

Organization.name: foundingLocation
Organization.desc: The place where the Organization was founded.

Organization.name: owns
Organization.desc: Products owned by the organization or person.

Organization.name: event
Organization.desc: Upcoming or past event associated with this place, organization, or action.

Organization.name: founder
Organization.desc: A person who founded this organization.

Organization.name: publishingPrinciples
Organization.desc:
The publishingPrinciples property indicates (typically via URL) a document describing the editorial principles of an Organization (or individual e.g. a Person writing a blog) that relate to their activities as a publisher, e.g. ethics or diversity policies. When applied to a CreativeWork (e.g. NewsArticle) the principles are those of the party primarily responsible for the creation of the CreativeWork.

While such policies are most typically expressed in natural language, sometimes related information (e.g. indicating a funder) can be expressed using schema.org terminology.

Organization.name: sponsor
Organization.desc: A person or organization that supports a thing through a pledge, promise, or financial contribution. e.g. a sponsor of a Medical Study or a corporate sponsor of an event.

Organization.name: isicV4
Organization.desc: The International Standard of Industrial Classification of All Economic Activities (ISIC), Revision 4 code for a particular organization, business person, or place.

Organization.name: location
Organization.desc: The location of for example where the event is happening, an organization is located, or where an action takes place.

Organization.name: brand
Organization.desc: The brand(s) associated with a product or service, or the brand(s) maintained by an organization or business person.

Organization.name: vatID
Organization.desc: The Value-added Tax ID of the organization or person.

Organization.name: leiCode
Organization.desc: An organization identifier that uniquely identifies a legal entity as defined in ISO 17442.

Organization.name: faxNumber
Organization.desc: The fax number.
